title: Bug 6322 - All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: The Open Type dialog in JDK 1.4 displays obfuscated classes (such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd') prominently.
OB: The obfuscated classes are shown prominently in the Open Type dialog.
EB: The obfuscated classes should have less prominence in the Open Type dialog.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:  
1. Launch JDK 1.4.  
2. Open the Open Type dialog.  
3. Observe that the obfuscated classes are displayed prominently.
